mst06.name: msg_town_mission_sonic
mst06.message: Put on the shoes, and go through the Rings!\nIf I've made the shoes correctly, you'll make\nit on time!

Amazing!
They performed exactly as I thought!
My Custom Shoes are complete! I will give you these shoes. 
You'll be able to use them. Money? I don't want any money.
I'm happy just knowing that they're being used. The stones that you can fit into the shoes
are called gems, and you can buy them at the
shop over there. They're very rare, but if you put one in these
Custom Shoes, they will give you an entirely
new ability. The best shoes in the world, worn by the best
runner in the world. I'm so happy!
Thank you!
Don't worry about it.\nThese shoes are special, and their true power\ncan only be used by the chosen one.
Thank you!\nCan you also save Princess Elise, please?\fThis is a sign of our appreciation.
Pele is over there.\nSave him, please!
Let's go!\nIf you can't catch us on time, we win. \nIf you can, you win!

Ow... 
Dang it, you're so fast! Okay you win.
Youâ€™re on our team starting from today.
So hurry, and save Elise!
See?\nYou're not capable of saving the Princess!
There's no time!\nHurry and take this ball to my brother!\nHe's at the foot of those high bells!
Yeah! The ball is here!\nNow I can play the game!\nThank you!
Come on, you said you were good at soccer... \nI wonder what my brother's doing now...
Let's start!\fAttack the ball just once,\nthen sit back and watch.\nAim right!

Wow... 
$ barrels!
Great score! All right, here's your prize!
Take it!
Your barrel total was $?\nTough luck.\nCome back again!
The robots are over there.\nGood luck!

Thank you for saving the
fountain! Princess Elise likes this statue, too. 
This fountain will make any wish come true.
Why don't you try it?
Haha! You're on!\nLet's start the 100-Ring collecting game!

Haha! You didn't find them!
What? You did?
But... That's impossible...  P... Pocket? I dropped the last one from
my pocket? Urg... Well done. Fine, take all of the Rings... 
(Dang it, at this rate, I'll only be the second
richest man in the city...)
Haha! You couldn't find them, eh? Tough luck.\nThe game's over.

It's that blue car!
Attack it and break it so it can't run away! You have to catch it before
time runs out. 
Or else, it will get away!
Thank you!\nNow my store is back to normal.\nTake this as a gift of appreciation.
The one who reaches the station first wins.\nOkay?
From here to the station, just like before!\nLet's do it!

No way... Wait, those are real spikes... 
Are you the real Sonic!?
Can I have your autograph? I can't believe I've met the real
Sonic. It's such an honor!
I want to be just like you! Can I be your apprentice?
I can never beat you.\nYou're my hero!
You're just wearing a costume.\nI'm the real Sonic!
What's going on?\nDon't go easy on me!
It's not that hard.\nYou guess the number of boxes, that's all.\nIt'll get more difficult as it goes on, though.
All correct...\nI lose.\nLet's battle again sometime!
Haha, wrong!\nYou can't beat me.\nTry again some other time!

The password is on the discs that the enemies
have. When you collect them all, break the
numbered boxes in the order of the password! If you push the wrong password,
the medal will be lost!
Thank you!\nYou can have the Silver medal!\nI'm sure you'll find a good use for it!
Okay, let's start!\nDeliver them to the people with signs.\nThere's not a lot of time, so be fast!

The number of gelatos you delivered
was $? Great! Do you want to work
here full-time? Okay, I understand...
This is your pay.
Thank you! The number of\ngelatos you delivered was $.\nHere's your pay.
The gelatos melted?\nI can't pay you for that.
Let the Festival of Rings begin!\nReady, go!
Wow... I didn't think anybody could collect \nthat many Rings. But a promise is a promise,\nso the rings are yours.
That's not really very many. \nWell, it happens, I suppose.
Please come visit our hotel again.
5 questions! Smash the right box. If correct, \nyou can move on. If not, boom!
Question 1! In what year was the\nfirst Sonic the Hedgehog released?
Question 5! Last one, it's \ndifficult! How heavy is Sonic?

All correct! 
You're amazing!
Here's the secret letter! Thank you for always being supportive!
...From the Sonic Team
 What was in the letter?
Tell me!
Tough luck!\nTry again some other time!
You think you can do the acrobatic Rings?\nFirst, I need to test you before\nwe put you in the show.

Wow.
You made it look so easy!
You've got talent! Please join our show!
Here's a starting bonus!
Don't worry.\nNo one can do this on their first try.
The three thieves are \nhiding somewhere near here.\nPlease catch them!
Ouch...\nI give up, I give up!
Thank you for helping me out.\nThere are a lot of people who are looking\nforward to these Soleannan apples. Thanks!
Oh no...\nThe next apple shipment will be delayed.
There are 10 medals.\nThey've got to be here!\nFind them before they're taken!
Thanks for helping me out.\nI'll be careful with these \nfrom now on.
Oh no... maybe somebody took them already...
Let's start the training!\nDestroy as many as possible!\nHere we go!

What...?
$ of them?
Who are you? Please join the Soleannan guards!
Please!
Haha! It was too hard for you!\fIt's hard to become a Soleannan soldier.\nNow you know.
Really? You will move swiftly for me?\nI'll be watching you!

Oh yeah, that's it.
That's the move I want.
Now, I'll be able to write a good song. Wind Canzone is the name.
This will be a hit!
No, that's not good enough... \nI was this close to inspiration...
There's one minute to destruction...\nRush to the station!
The bomb was found and defused.\nThank you, thank you so much!

Soleanna's Key Festival:
The one who finds the key with 
the help of the hints will receive the prize. Hint:
Somewhere low, in the New City
Hint:\nNear the place with the mysterious machinery
Congratulations!\nSonic is the winner of this year's key hunt.\nHe will be given a prize.\fCongratulations, Sonic!
Help!\nThe robots are after me!\nPlease take me to the Castle Town!

Thank you!
Sonic, I think the robots were 
after the lady-in-waiting, Anna. Anna knows a lot about Soleanna.
I'm sure they wanted to get the information
from her.
Well done...\nYou deserve the treasure of\nSoleanna.
Unfortunately, you will not be\ngetting the treasure.
Listen to the introduction of\nthe song and tell me the name!
1. Sonic ADV 1\n2. Sonic ADV 2\n3. Sonic Heroes
1. Sonic's theme\n2. Shadow's theme\n3. Silver's theme
1. Elise's theme\n2. Eggman's theme\n3. Sonic's theme
1. Sound of a ring\n2. Sound of a save point\n3. Sound when smashing an item box
Number of answers correct, $.\nBetter luck next time!
Name That Song,\nsee you next week!
Mels got through all the Rings in 5 minutes.\nGo through the Rings as fast as you can!

Wow... you really did it. Oh no.
Who are you? Oh, you are the blue hedgehog who
rescued Princess Elise? 
No wonder you are so fast!

Me? The captain?
Did you hear that from Alessio? Haha, that's Alessio for you.
You've been fooled.
I'm just a lieutenant. I don't know where the captain is. Why don't you ask all of the 
soldiers in town?

There are five soldiers including
me in this town. 
Talk to all of them. But, some soldiers will feel threatened
by you for taking their work. Some might try to trick you,
so be careful. I think there might be two that 
will try to do that... If you can figure out who the captain is,
come back and talk to me.

... You guessed it, I'm the captain. I'm the one of the two who tricked you. I didn't want anyone else
involved in Soleanna's business...
But, you seem to have the strength... I will ask you on behalf of all the guards.
Please help us save the Princess.
You couldn't find out who was\nthe real captain. Then, unfortunately...\fI will not be able to open the gate.
That's what I said.\nI'm not the captain...
The captain is one of the men\nyou've already spoken to.
I told you, the captain is in front of\nthe fountain.
Did you figure out who the Captain is?
All right, go ahead and talk to the one \nwho you think is the captain.
Okay, then let's wait a while.
Your intelligence will be tested.\nGet to the goal by following the warp gates.
You've proven your intelligence.\nMove on to the next challenge.
Hmm... That's not good enough to open\nthe way to the old castle.
Your courage will be tested here.\nFight the enemies in this \nlife-or-death battle.
You've proven your courage.\nMove on to the last challenge.

The last challenge is about love. Your last battle may be the 
hardest one you've ever experienced. You must lose something in order to 
gain something. There may be moments like this. For when that moment comes, you must
make your decision here and now.
I acknowledge your decision.\nGo to the old castle for \nthe last challenge.
I acknowledge your decision.\nGo to the old castle for \nthe last challenge.

I see. You've chosen your long-time love. That's your choice. 
I'll respect that. Your choice will support you
throughout the upcoming battle. The way to the old castle is 
opened. Go your way.

That's your answer. I won't comment on the Princess.
It takes courage to choose one who carries
the weight of a nation on her shoulders. With that conviction, you will
overcome the obstacles that
lie ahead. The way to the old castle is 
opened. Go your way.
There's a key in one of the \nbarrels. Can you help me find it?\nYou can smash all the barrels if you need to.
Thanks!\nGood, now I can go home.
Go through all the Rings in time!
Destroy all of Dr. Eggman's mechs!
Catch 6 kids within the time limit!
Dribble the ball and take it to\nthe child at the foot of the tall bells!
Attack the ball once to roll it. \nSmash as many barrels as you can!\nYou win a prize for smashing more then $ barrels!
Go through all the Rings in 5 minutes!
Destroy all enemies before the \nfountain is destroyed!
Chase the blue car and destroy\nit before the time limit!
Get to the station before Sonic Man does!
Count the stacked wooden boxes and \ndestroy the wooden box with the right number!
Get the password from the enemy! \nSmash the numbered boxes matching the\npassword to get the Silver medal!
Deliver gelato to as many customers as you can\nbefore time runs out! Earn more for long-\ndistance deliveries.
Collect as many Rings as possible\nwithin the time limit!
Go through all the Rings \nwithin the time limit!
Collect 10 bronze medals within\nthe time limit!
Destroy as many targets as possible\nwithin the time limit!
Destroy the enemies in the new \ntown and get the 3 disks!
Defeat the enemy in front\nof the cave and open the gate!
Get to the goal before time runs out!
Go through the Rings in right order!
Use the hints to find the key!
Destroy the robots attacking the \nlady-in-waiting and take her to the\nentrance of the Castle Town!
Follow the warp gates to the goal!
Tails: Go through all the Rings in time!\nKnuckles: Smash all the Rocks in time!\nSonic: Get to the Goal in time!
Listen to the opening, and pick the correct song!
Find the key hidden in a barrel!
Get the Soccer Ball \nto My Brother!
Destroy all Enemies \nin the New City!
The Lost Key in the Barrel
Light Cores have tremendous power that\nrivals that of the Chaos Drive.
The strange monsters that have been\nbeen appearing recently are in possession\nof Light Cores.
Black monsters carry a particularly high\nnumber of Light Cores.
Bahaha! Can't find them?\nGiving up so soon?
Whoa! I'm shocked!\nWhat's the reason for busting up something\nlike that?
Someone point me to the real commander!

Oh, thank you!
To think I almost lost this disk...
You've saved my company! I should have mentioned this earlier, but
I'm a representative of Rimlight.
We're a very fast-growing corporation. We hope to use the new type of energy
discovered in Light Cores to...
Oh, you've got better things to do, I'm sure. Again, thank you very much.
We are in your debt.
Mr. Sonic! Dr. Eggman's mechs suddenly appeared!\fWe are no match to them...\nMr. Sonic, Please help us!

Welcome, you three.
I'm the spirit of Antonio, one of
the three musketeers of Soleanna. If you can overcome the 
challenges, I will give you
the treasure of Soleanna. Let's begin! First, the flying speed challenge.

That disk has all my company's top secret
classified data on it! If I lose it I will get 
sacked! Sonic, please!
Get my disk back from them, hurry!
